text: Momoko Kōchi (born Momoko Okouchi March 7, 1932 - November 5, 1998) was a Japanese actress. She is best known for her roles in the original Godzilla, playing the character of Emiko Yamane. Kōchi later played the same role in Godzilla vs. Destoroyah in 1995. She starred in The Mysterians, playing Hiroko Iwamoto. Kōchi was discovered in 1953 in Toho's New Face Contest. By the late 1950s she found herself typecast into science fiction and horror movies. She decided to pursue formal acting. In the 1960s she was on stage doing Shakespeare. She also did occasional television commercials. She didn't act in movies again until 1995. Kōchi died at age 66 in Tokyo Japan on November 5, 1998 from intestinal cancer. ==Selected filmography== Year Title Role Notes 1954 Godzilla Emiko Yamane 1955 Half Human Machiko Takeno 1957 Ikuko Asō The Mysterians Hiroko Iwamoto 1958 aka The Princess of Badger Palace 1995 Godzilla vs. Destoroyah Emiko Yamane == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Actors from Tokyo Category:Japanese movie actors
title: Momoko Kōchi
